headline: Capital One Financial Corporation (COF): CEO’s Going For A “Worldwide Card,” Says Jim Cramer
summary: We recently published 10 Stocks On Jim Cramer’s Mind As He Gives Up On Becoming Fed Chair. Capital One Financial Corporation (NYSE:COF) is one of the stocks Jim Cramer recently discussed. Capital One Financial Corporation (NYSE:COF)’s merger with Discovery has made it one of Cramer’s favorite stocks in the banking industry. He is particularly enthusiastic […]

headline: Is This Top Warren Buffett Stock a No-Brainer Buy Right Now?
summary: As this is Berkshire’s second-biggest position, Buffett has certainly found some traits he appreciates.  This premium credit card brand boasts superb charge-off rates that are the envy of the industry.  Shares of American Express have performed exceptionally well in recent years, creating valuation risk.

headline: Delta’s struggles with the airport lounge and the angst of the upper middle class in the age of ‘elite overproduction,’ explained
summary: Peter Turchin argues that societies collapse when there isn't enough room at the top. "There is a limited amount of space, but many more elites now ... low-rank elites.

headline: How Amex took over the world
summary: There is one phrase an American Express cardholder hears probably more often than any other: “Sorry, we don’t take Amex.”

raw.headline: How Amex took over the world
raw.summary: There is one phrase an American Express cardholder hears probably more often than any other: “Sorry, we don’t take Amex.”

headline: The Amex alternatives that offer better rewards
summary: American Express (Amex) is synonymous with credit card spending but it’s also known for its deals that offer generous cashback, points-based rewards and exclusive perks including priority access to gigs, film screenings and theatre shows. But while these rewards can be appealing, Amex isn’t always the best option.
